mod_list.mod:
This mod adds a number of insurgent vehicles and objects to DCS World. The units are heavily based on ISIS insurgents. The first itteration of the mod will feature a range of Ural trucks, Toyota pickups and a number of IED related objects.
Models used in this mod are bought and fully licensed for non commercial distribution.
============= Contents=============
Objects: Found under fortifications in the mission editor.
LLH Diesel Drum LLH Fertilizer Bag LLH Fertilizer Stack LLH Unfinished IED Digging Site LLH Shovel Planted LLH Shovel Flat LLH Tarped Cache LLH Jerrycan IED
Units: Found under unarmed (even though some are armed) in the mission editor.
LLH ISIS Ural Troops LLH ISIS Ural Covered LLH ISIS Ural ZU2 LLH ISIS Ural Flak LLH ISIS Toyota LLH ISIS Toyota DShK
